mapper.insert: INSERT INTO reservation (reservation_id, payment_id, a_id, u_id, reservation_headcount, review_status, reservation_status, reservation_date) VALUES (reservation_seq.NEXTVAL, #{paymentId}, #{aId}, #{uId}, #{reservationHeadcount}, DEFAULT, DEFAULT, TO_DATE(#{reservationDate}, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS'))
INSERT INTO payment_info VALUES (payment_info_seq.NEXTVAL, DEFAULT, #{paymentAmount}, SYSDATE + 7)
mapper.update: UPDATE reservation SET payment_id = #{paymentId}, reservation_date = TO_DATE(#{reservationDate}, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') WHERE reservation_id = #{reservationId}
